title: Shirasagi Castle
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Seal

le LRC: [ 遠志 ] {Tōshi}; LLC in bottom margin, in grey
description: five-level blue and white castle tower on top of hill in background, center; rosy sky; green farmland in middle ground; trees and foliage in foreground
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
